articles.description: Follow live text, BBC coverage, radio commentary, reaction and updates of medals and results from Winter Olympics in Milan-Cortina.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026 LIVE: Day seven - watch BBC - medals, results, TV stream & updates from Milan-Cortina

articles.description: Igor Tudor agrees a deal to become Tottenham interim head coach until the end of the season.
articles.title: Igor Tudor agrees deal to become Tottenham's interim boss

articles.description: Ukrainian skeleton racer Vladyslav Heraskevych will not compete at the Winter Olympics after the Court of Arbitration for Sport dismissed his appeal to wear a helmet depicting images of athletes killed during Russia's invasion of his home country.
articles.title: Ukrainian slider Vladyslav Herasevych's appeal to wear 'helmet of remembrance' dismissed by sport court

articles.description: Blessing Muzarabani claims a superb 4-17 as Zimbabwe held their nerve to stun Australia with a thrilling 23-run win in the T20 World Cup.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Zimbabwe claim 23-run win over Australia as Blessing Muzarabani takes 4-17

articles.description: Scotland and England share a border and some of the same pool of eligible players. The fight to ensure the best end up on your side is fiercer than ever.
articles.title: Scotland v England: The fight for dual-qualified Six Nations stars

articles.description: Team GB's men's curlers fight back against Italy after a poor start but lose their first match of the 2026 Winter Olympics.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: GB left to rue shocking start after Italy defeat

articles.description: Uefa referees' chief Roberto Rosetti says video assistant review (VAR) is becoming too forensic and handball must be revisited.
articles.title: VAR has become 'too microscopic' - Uefa refs' chief

articles.description: After 11 years away, fallen giants Bradford Bulls return to Super League in 2026 aiming to rekindle past glories.
articles.title: Bradford Bulls: Fallen giants set for new Super League chapter

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says we will "have a better society" by embracing other cultures, in response to Sir Jim Ratcliffe's immigration remarks.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola responds to Sir Jim Ratcliffe's immigration comments

articles.description: Red Bull's advantage at the front of the Formula 1 field "has been really eye-opening for a lot of us," says Mercedes driver George Russell.
articles.title: F1 testing: Red Bull's advantage 'pretty scary', says George Russell
